description:
Solve the **Word Ladder** problem.

Given a beginWord, endWord, and a wordList, find the length of the shortest transformation sequence from beginWord to endWord such that only one letter is changed at a time and each intermediate word exists in wordList. Return 0 if no such sequence exists.

See the full problem description on [LeetCode](https://leetcode.com/problems/word-ladder/).
constraints: beginWord, endWord, and wordList[i] consist of lowercase English letters
All words in wordList are unique
